describe: The United States of America is a vast and diverse country located in North America. It is known for its cultural influence, technological innovation, and varied landscapes ranging from beaches to mountains.

cities.name: üå≥ New York City
cities.geographical_location: Northeastern United States, at the mouth of the Hudson River
cities.climate: Humid subtropical climate with cold winters and hot, humid summers

cities.name: üèù Los Angeles
cities.geographical_location: Southern California, on the west coast of the United States
cities.climate: Mediterranean climate with mild, wet winters and hot, dry summers

cities.name: üå≥ Chicago
cities.geographical_location: Midwestern United States, on the southwestern shore of Lake Michigan
cities.climate: Humid continental climate with cold winters and warm summers
cities.famous_cuisine: Deep-dish pizza, Chicago-style hot dogs, Italian beef sandwiches

cities.name: üèù Miami
cities.geographical_location: Southeastern United States, on the Atlantic coast of Florida
cities.climate: Tropical monsoon climate with hot, humid summers and warm, dry winters
cities.famous_cuisine: Cuban sandwiches, stone crab, key lime pie

cities.name: üèù San Francisco
cities.geographical_location: Northern California, on the west coast of the United States
cities.climate: Mediterranean climate with cool, wet winters and dry summers
cities.famous_cuisine: Sourdough bread, Dungeness crab, Mission burritos
